definition: lane (usually as part of a street name)/memorial archway

sentences.english: Joe gathered the boys and girls of the neighbourhood for a picnic.
sentences.chinese: 喬把街坊四鄰的男孩和女孩們集合起來去野餐。

sentences.english: It asks us the teahouse as the centre of the neighbourhood.
sentences.chinese: 它叫我們茶館作爲街坊四鄰的活動中心。

sentences.english: Burnt to cinders, we were told by the neighbourhood gossips.
sentences.chinese: 我們從街坊四鄰的閒言碎語中得知他被燒成了灰。

sentences.english: It asks us to see the teahouse as the center of the neighbourhood.
sentences.chinese: 《茶館》讓我們茶館作爲街坊四鄰的活動中心。

sentences.english: The noise upset the entire neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 噪聲鬧得整個街坊四鄰心煩意亂。

sentences.english: The fire alarmed all the neighbors on the street.
sentences.chinese: 火災使整個街坊四鄰都驚恐起來。
